bio:
Jin Huang is a Visiting Assistant Professor of Marketing at NYU Shanghai. She holds a PhD from CEMFI and a BS from Central University of Finance and Economics.

Professor Huang’s research interests are Marketing Strategy, Internet Marketing, Industrial Organization and Behavioral Economics.

Education

  • Ph.D., Economics, CEMFI, 2017
  • B.S., Mathematical Economics, and Mathematical Finance, Central University of Finance and Economics, 2011

Languages

  • English
  • Chinese
